news.headline: MAMP PRO for Windows now on sale
news.text:
August, 2015 – MAMP PRO for Windows now on sale
We´ve just started the sale of MAMP PRO for Windows
All Mac customers with a MAMP PRO 3 license get a big discount on the Windows version

news.headline: Beta 1 for MAMP & MAMP PRO for Windows available now!
news.text:
April, 2015 – First Beta version of MAMP & MAMP PRO for Windows
We have released Beta 1 for the Windows version of MAMP & MAMP PRO
You can download the Beta starting today!

news.headline: MAMP & MAMP PRO 3.1 ready for download
news.text:
March, 2015 – We´ve updated MAMP & MAMP PRO to Version 3.1
We´ve fixed the "start servers on startup" bug.
New components in this version:
MySQL updated to 5.5.42
PHP 5.4.38, 5.5.22 & 5.6.6
PHPUnit 4.4
phoMyAdmin 4.3.10

news.headline: MAMP & MAMP PRO for Windows Alpha 1 released
news.text:
15th January, 2015 – We´ve just released MAMP & MAMP PRO for Windows Alpha 1 This is the first free preview to MAMP & MAMP PRO for Windows
We hope you´ll like it!

news.headline: Over 23,000 Web servers infected with CryptoPHP backdoor
news.text:
"Over 23,000 Web servers were infected with a backdoor called CryptoPHP that’s bundled with pirated themes and plug-ins for popular content management systems.
CryptoPHP is a malicious script that provides remote attackers with the ability to execute rogue code on Web servers and to inject malicious content into websites that are hosted on them."

news.headline: appsolute - The MAMP company - is looking for an iOS Developer
news.text: Full time permanent role with an exciting company that is building ground breaking applications.

news.headline: Follow us on Twitter
news.text:
28th October, 2014 – Get our latest news on Twitter

news.headline: MAMP & MAMP PRO 3.0.7.2 released
news.text:
21th October, 2014 – MAMP & MAMP PRO 3.0.7.2 released

This release corrects the php.ini file
We´ve also added PHP 5.6.2, 5.4.34, 5.5.18

news.headline: MAMP & MAMP PRO 3.0.7.1 released
news.text:
17th October, 2014 – MAMP & MAMP PRO 3.0.7.1 released

This release fixes a bug with Apache not starting in conjunction with SSL

news.headline: MAMP 3.0.1 for Windows released
news.text:
September 26, 2014 – We´ve released MAMP for Windows version 3.0.1

We´ve just released the first update for MAMP for Windows
What´s new?
• menu bar added (open with alt-key)
• improved German language support
• default PHP-versions: PHP 5.5.12 & 5.6.0
• added MySQL-tools and commands
• several bugfixes

news.headline: MAMP.TV launched
news.text:
September, 2014 – Today we launched MAMP.TV

We´ve started a youtube channel with MAMP screencasts on MAMP.TV
You can find tutorials, walk throughs and some advise for trouble shooting.
We hope you´ll enjoy it and please feel free to make suggestions for upcoming topics on MAMP.TV
